source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_00<tab>R'ashaht Rhiki would have you begin your training in earnest.
target: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_00<tab>黒渦団のル・アシャ大甲佐は冒険者に話があるようだ。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_01<tab>High Storm Commander R'ashaht Rhiki has great hopes for your future in the Maelstrom, and would send you for training to see your potential fulfilled. Board the ferry from the Moraby Drydocks in lower La Noscea to get to the Wolves' Den. Once there, seek out Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn.
target: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_01<tab>ル・アシャ大甲佐から、グランドカンパニー将兵の練兵所「ウルヴズジェイル」を紹介された。リムサ・ロミンサ沖のウルヴズジェイルにいる「ベルクーヤ大甲士」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_02<tab>After seeing fit to batter every last shred of confidence and self-respect out of you with a brutal tongue-lashing, Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn reluctantly grants you permission to begin your training at the Wolves' Den.
target: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_SEQ_02<tab>ベルクーヤ大甲士と話すことができた。彼は冒険者を歓迎し、「ウルヴズジェイル」で存分に鍛えていくよう、激励してくれた。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Berkoeya Loetahlsyn at the Wolves' Den.
target: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_TODO_00<tab>ウルヴズジェイルのベルクーヤ大甲士と話す

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>─just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was hoping to see. Your exploits of late have been the talk of Limsa.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_000やあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>)) (()) /var>。
キミは我が「黒渦団」の一員として、
実によく働いてくれている、すばらしいよ！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_001<tab>Don't let this puff your sails up too much, but I've heard some of the higher<var 1F /var>ups saying that the Maelstrom would be lost at sea without you.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_001キミの力は、これからの「黒渦団」の発展において、
なくてはならないものになるはず、だけど……

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_002<tab>But I suspect you're not the type to rest on your laurels. Nay, the tempest raging in your eyes tells me you're looking for new waters to navigate.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_002あたしたちとしては、キミに今以上の働きを期待したい！
その実力を、さらに磨き上げてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_003<tab>Fortunately, we have just the place for people like you. Have you perchance heard of the Wolves' Den?
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_003そこで、キミに紹介したい施設がある。
エオルゼア都市軍事同盟が共同で設立した、
グランドカンパニー将兵の練兵所だ。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_004<tab>It's a proving ground of sorts established by the Eorzean Alliance─a place where the most promising of Grand Company recruits are sent to hone their skills.
target: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_004<tab>その名を……「ウルヴズジェイル」！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_005<tab>The Wolves' Den is to be found just off the shores of La Noscea. The ferry at the Moraby Drydocks in lower La Noscea will grant you passage there.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_005すでにキミが施設を利用できるよう、連絡しておいたよ。
受付の「ベルクーヤ大甲士」に話しかければ、
すぐさま「ウルヴズジェイル」に参加できるはず。

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_006<tab>Upon your arrival, seek out Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn. I've let him know that you'll be coming, so you can count on a warm welcome.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_RASHAHTRHIKI_000_006「ウルヴズジェイル」は、リムサ・ロミンサ沖の洋上にある。
低地ラノシアの「モラビー造船廠」から、
渡し船が出ているから、ぜひ一度、訪ねてみるんだね！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_010<tab>I don't recall seein' yer ugly mug around here before. Hm? Ye say that <var 1A 02 /var>Rhiki<var 1A 01 /var> sent ye!?
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_010私の名はベルクーヤ・ルータルシン大甲士！
狼たちの牢獄、「ウルヴズジェイル」の訓練教官である！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_011<tab>She said she was sendin' a new wolf to the Den─bah! More like the runt of the litter, if ye ask me.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_011現在この地では、各国グランドカンパニー所属者や、
冒険者部隊からの志願者による合同訓練……
「クリスタルコンフリクト」を行っている！！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_012<tab>Ye barely have fangs for the honin', but I guess I'm feelin' godsdamned generous, so I'll throw ye a bone─start yerself off with Crystalline Conflict. Them trainin' bouts are made special for feckless adventurin' types who can't tell sound strategy from a horse's arse.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_012それすなわち、人対人の戦闘訓練！
所属も階級も、ましてや過去の名声も関係なく、
ただ己が牙と爪を以て存在を証明する……熱き獣の戦である！！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_013<tab>I still reckon it won't be <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dawn)) ((midday)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((sundown)) ((dawn)) /var>)) /var> before ye run home with yer tail between yer legs, cryin' for yer mum, but ye can have a word with Lieutenant Gungi Zelungi if ye insist on givin' it a go. Ye'll find him outside, assumin' ye can work up the nerve.
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_013牙を剥け！　爪を研げ！　
ここで戦い、鍛え続け、敵に喰らいつく猛犬に……
いや、獰猛なる狼となれ！

source: TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_014<tab>And stand up straight, maggot! This ain't no place for the weak of spine. Dismissed!
target:
TEXT_COMLIM001_01104_BERKOEYA_000_014食われるままの肉で終わりたくなければ、
外で、担当者に話を聞くがいい……
「クリスタルコンフリクト」の基本を、叩き込んでくれるはずだ！
